abstract: The Hunt column on the search by a New York City couple and their two children for a three-bedroom home in Manhattan; found condominium unit at 1 Rector Park in Lower Manhattan for $1.99 million.
snippet: After the birth of their second son, Vivek and Roshini Nasta knew they needed to move out of their loft, into a place with a more traditional layout.
lead_paragraph: After the birth of their second son, Vivek and Roshini Nasta knew they needed to move out of their loft, into a place with a more traditional layout.

headline.main: Putting Down Roots in a Place Above Trees
headline.print_headline: Putting Down Roots in a Place Above Trees
